scripts.build:aws-sdk: cd ../../aws-sdk-serviceworker && npm i && npm run build && cp aws-sdk-2.1209.0-sw.js ../front/my-app/extension/aws-sdk.js
scripts.build:front: rm -fr dist && rm -fr extension/dist && parcel build src/index.html && cp -R ./dist extension/dist && npm run build:content
scripts.build:content: npm run rewrite-content-file:add-scriptpath && npm run rewrite-content-file:add-stylespath
scripts.rewrite-content-file:add-scriptpath: echo "const scriptPath = \"$(find ./dist -iname *.js)\";" | cat - extension/content.template.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out extension/content.js
scripts.rewrite-content-file:add-stylespath: echo "const stylesPath = \"$(find ./dist -iname *.css)\";" | cat - extension/content.js > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out extension/content.js
scripts.build:full: npm run build:aws-sdk && npm run build:front && npm run build:background
scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run build:background
